changeSet.sql: UPDATE audit_record SET document_id = UNHEX( REPLACE( REPLACE( CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') END , "-","") , "\"","") ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT json_schema_document_id FROM json_schema_document WHERE json_schema_document_id = ( SELECT UNHEX( REPLACE( REPLACE( CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') END , '-','') , '"','') ) WHERE REPLACE( REPLACE( CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.documentId') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.businessKey') WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') IS NOT NULL THEN JSON_EXTRACT(audit_event, '$.dossierId') END , '-','') , '"','') REGEXP '^[0-9aAbBcCdDeEfF]+$' = 1 ) )
